verbs.description: U2 's Bono [V: has] joined the emotional debate over the administration 's child - separation policy at the border , lobbying lawmakers to try to bring an end to the Trump policy .

[ARG0: U2 's Bono] has [V: joined] [ARG1: the emotional debate over the administration 's child - separation policy at the border] , [ARGM-ADV: lobbying lawmakers to try to bring an end to the Trump policy] .
